Uses of Class
com.goebl.david.Request

    • Uses of Request in com.goebl.david

      Methods in com.goebl.david that return Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request Request.body(Object body)
      Set the payload for the request.
      Request Request.compress()
      Enable compression for uploaded data.
      Request Request.connectTimeout(int connectTimeout)
      See URLConnection.setConnectTimeout
      Request Webb.delete(String pathOrUri)
      Creates a DELETE HTTP request with the specified absolute or relative URI.
      Request Request.ensureSuccess()
      By calling this method, the HTTP status code is checked and a WebbException is thrown if the status code is not something like 2xx.
      Request Request.followRedirects(boolean auto)
      See .
      Request Webb.get(String pathOrUri)
      Creates a GET HTTP request with the specified absolute or relative URI.
      Request Response.getRequest()
      Access to the Request object (which will not be very useful in most cases).
      Request Request.header(String name, Object value)
      Set (or overwrite) a HTTP header value.
      Request Request.ifModifiedSince(long ifModifiedSince)
      See URLConnection.setIfModifiedSince()
      Request Request.param(String name, Object value)
      Set (or overwrite) a parameter.
      Request Webb.post(String pathOrUri)
      Creates a POST HTTP request with the specified absolute or relative URI.
      Request Webb.put(String pathOrUri)
      Creates a PUT HTTP request with the specified absolute or relative URI.
      Request Request.readTimeout(int readTimeout)
      See
      Request Request.retry(int retryCount, boolean waitExponential)
      Set the number of retries after the first request failed.
      Request Request.useCaches(boolean useCaches)
      See URLConnection.useCaches
      If you don't want your requests delivered from a cache, you don't have to call this method, because false is the default.
